channel.title: Need help with like 3 questions, help plz
channel.description: 1. how do i host my server. 2. how do i add in skill capes/and get them to do emote (if possible) 3.last question, how do i get npc's to say stuff, like "cory is online/offline." ect. Help would be greatly appreciated

item.title: Need help with like 3 questions, help plz
item.dc:creator: @spid3rm4n spid3rm4n
item.description:
@spid3rm4n wrote:

#1. - Turn on your comp, click runserver.bat & leace it on for a few hours.
#2. - You can write your own code or copy someone elses. (You can make a copy of the dragon battle axe special & make your own.)
#3. - It is down in NPC handler, there is a guide in the forum.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with like 3 questions, help plz
item.dc:creator: @Fr33b1e Fr33b1e
item.description:
@Fr33b1e wrote:

I can answer #1 and #2.
#1, you can just use Hamachi, and it’ll work without buying hosting (but it might lag a bit).
#2, there is a tut in the Tutorials section on it, but it depends how good you are at coding, some people say they get like 10 errors, but I’ve had none so far.
#3 I can’t remember what to do, sorry bud.

Read full topic
